str2: A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To go in, come in, enter. From eis and erchomai; to enter.
Capernaum, a town of Galilee. Of Hebrew origin; Capernaum, a place in Palestine.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A dwelling; by implication, a family.
